blogPost.title: A beloved mayor and her family helped townspeople resist Russian occupation. They paid for it with their lives. https://t.co/5WhxX0QAB0
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

localize.full_text: ロシアの占領に抵抗する町民を支えた、愛すべき市長とその一家。彼らはその代償として命を捧げた。https://t.co/5WhxX0QAB0
一位受人爱戴的市长和她的家人帮助镇民抵制俄罗斯的占领。他们为此付出了生命的代价。https://t.co/5WhxX0QAB0
一位受人愛戴的市長和她的家人幫助鎮民抵制俄羅斯的佔領。他們爲此付出了生命的代價。https://t.co/5WhxX0QAB0

previous.title: Why are there so many shows about younger, fallen CEOs? https://t.co/A9jz9jsIdp

localize.full_text: なぜ、若くて落ち目のCEOの番組が多いのか https://t.co/A9jz9jsIdp

爲什麼有這麼多關於年輕的、墮落的CEO的節目？https://t.co/A9jz9jsIdp

next.title: Twitter’s CEO said Tesla founder Elon Musk decided he won’t join the social-media company’s board of directors #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/4tgiJAQKun https://t.co/F59BUDSmuW

localize.full_text: TwitterのCEOは、テスラ創業者のイーロン・マスク氏がソーシャルメディア企業の取締役会に参加しないことを決めたと述べた #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/4tgiJAQKun https://t.co/F59BUDSmuW
Twitter的CEO表示，特斯拉创始人Elon Musk决定不会加入这家社交媒体公司的董事会#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/4tgiJAQKun https://t.co/F59BUDSmuW
Twitter的CEO表示，特斯拉創始人Elon Musk決定不會加入這家社交媒體公司的董事會#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/4tgiJAQKun https://t.co/F59BUDSmuW
